title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for June 2
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for June 2
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl J Riccadonna Chief US Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Forget about another tech bubble now, MKM says." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
